data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=n24bVJBsCDEQ7kNvgGoxjHY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDDcQAZUJ09JRdsI2ONcAdTklEXqoIcM1IH1TlJ6N689Q&oe=663B629C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031471_450514160975639_7876978019992583284_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=u0_7pFskhyIQ7kNvgFg2dO3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfB2m-xCVfhL2LC_rKKLqTmBZqnHfn43nd31oYxaTaCwLw&oe=663B428C)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75210396_1168100270905037_6056515960548689783_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=B0tcUNdYCCkQ7kNvgFcXiOn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfA4ri2IxA6gBUdorEfvhH85pKQpuXZG7bRa4fZJa4ONlg&oe=663B4824)
Dive into a breathtaking experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982554_1365777981490507_857979718693496025_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YAGtc5R0dBkQ7kNvgERtaio&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfA98_Lkg4YrygWZusODrPFyg1CJ1SYf4FPYSXEGxtYsNQ&oe=663B5488)
![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gg96bIS996gQ7kNvgGUVjQb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDraXcBUo9D9msKInBw9HRVDc72ZQdHQg-kPjOkyAnkfQ&oe=663B72D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035438_923857099517367_6431578607880239089_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Wzq_t206QQIQ7kNvgHzq7_S&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCGzpllB2YShinLDtVvAIL4LhL5S6Qif-zoWsCNN1xczg&oe=663B4293)

![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YPYwDy-thqIQ7kNvgGD93j2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDU0xJAFIuopkNZr69RYnHOcFOMSdOTS9Q3Mfowu_6CYw&oe=663B5570)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75295893_804268758252860_8856952948920548753_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RxJGgZmZyuoQ7kNvgHZ8gYv&_nc_oc=Adjz9N4jPeekTX-P1g2i9keYvEthohUbmsbQ0Whar5RxuAT5DvAitBQ6Lq_x6-sJNMg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDPYQnTzgJZMrSuxzzPYfIy20p87SSLZP0KZAELtSWnRw&oe=663B6AEB)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dRA96liGe_8Q7kNvgEl727l&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBv5t12ZCcFv8VkalOOwyBovAadlfBPTxTHgxgZqDRV0w&oe=663B5397)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë

![{"height":702,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982658_417699267880520_1132379095717972405_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LK0bDqg1nIgQ7kNvgE20qYm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCbO3ap_tUsm-hSOhZYkIjpbbXqe3s73Z_ZGVAAMSVv7A&oe=663B3E51)
